newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa's Metro buys Dimitri Liquors.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa's Metro buys Dimitri Liquors.

text.p: South African firm Metro Cash and Carry Ltd said on Thursday that it has acquired drinks chain R.R. Dimitri Liquours (Pty) Ltd for an undisclosed sum.
Dimitri operates 11 small liqour outlets in South Africa's northern Gauteng, Mpumalanga, North West and Northern provinces.
Metro sells a wide range of mass market products through small traders. "This deal will ensure them of their liquour requirements," the firm said in a statement.
